params._projectId: The ID of the project to which the funds received belong.

params._projects: A Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.
params._terminalDirectory: A directory of a project's current Juicebox terminal to receive payments in.
params._ticketBooth: A contract that manages Ticket printing and redeeming.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

printTickets(uint256,uint256,address,str.details: Only a project's owner or a designated operator can print tickets.

params._amount: The amount of tickets to print.
params._beneficiary: The address to send the printed tickets to.
params._memo: A memo to leave with the printing.
params._preferUnstakedTickets: If there is a preference to unstake the printed tickets.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to print tickets for.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescue(uint256,address,uint256).details: Callable only by project owner, if rescue is allowed by the projectId, if the project's current funding cycle is non recurring.

params._amount: The amount to rescue as a fixed point number.
params._beneficiary: The recipient of the resucued funds.
params._projectId: The ID of the project whose ETH is being resued.
The ID of the project to allow rescuing.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addToBalance(uint256).notice: Receives and allocates funds belonging to the specified project.

balanceOf(uint256).notice: The amount of ETH that each project is responsible for.

fundingCycles().notice: The contract storing all funding cycle configurations.

printTickets(uint256,uint256,address,str.notice: Allows a project to print tickets for a specified beneficiary.

projects().notice: The Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

rescue(uint256,address,uint256).notice: A function that burns the supply of the dead address for a project.

rescueAllowed(uint256).notice: The addresses that are allowed to be rescued.

ticketBooth().notice: The contract that manages Ticket printing and redeeming.

toggleRescue(uint256).notice: Allows certain projects to migrate to have funds rescued.

userdoc.notice: Terminal allowing allow listed projects with one-time funding cycles to rescue stuck ETH.
